name: A Chance To impress
description:
You notice that your crush is on the other side of the level, now is your chance to impress her. But what must you do to be impressed by her?

-- Controls --

A,D or arrow keys or Controller D-pad to move left and right.

Space or W to jump (Hold longer to jump higher)

Made for MiniJam95: Chance.

-- Credits --

Music by FoxSynergy from OpenGameArt.org
